summary: This document is a chain of emails from August 2021 discussing the scheduling of an interview with a potential victim and her attorney. The interview is a spinoff from the Ghislaine Maxwell case and concerns a report of a sexual assault by an individual named 'Black' at Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan townhouse in 2001.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: The email chain concerns a 'spinoff interview from Maxwell,' indicating the interview is related to or derived from the case against Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Black
persons.context: Described as the individual who allegedly sexually assaulted a victim at Epstein's Manhattan townhouse in 2001.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The alleged assault is reported to have occurred at his Manhattan townhouse.

connections.description: The alleged assault by Black occurred at Epstein's property, suggesting a connection between them.
The interview is a spinoff from the Maxwell case, which is centrally about her association with Epstein.

events.title: Alleged assault at Epstein townhouse
events.description: A victim reported being sexually assaulted by an individual named Black at Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan townhouse.

events.title: Tentative witness interview scheduled
events.description: An interview with a victim and her attorney, related to the Maxwell case, was tentatively scheduled for this date.

locations: Southern District of New York (U.S. Attorney's Office)
keyFacts: A new potential victim came forward in 2021, alleging a sexual assault in 2001 at Epstein's Manhattan townhouse by an individual named Black.
The investigation into this allegation was treated as a 'spinoff' from the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
The victim's attorney was representing a second victim beyond one the email author had met in May.
The correspondence shows active coordination in 2021 to schedule an interview to determine if a new investigation should be opened.
The document is an internal email chain between prosecutors/agents, showing ongoing investigative work post-Epstein's death and during Maxwell's prosecution.
